items.defaultMessage: Confident and talented professional Web Developer with uncommonly strong energy & aptitude
15+ years of experience in web development with a long list of successful projects
‘Lives & breathes’ programming, taking pride in ability to overcome the ‘impossible challenges’
Skilled in object-oriented programming, building contemporary, clean, scalable, readable and reusable code
Adept in understanding/interpreting extremely complex information into user friendly language
Spatially aware & intuitive - building solutions ahead of the trends
Hard working & dedicated with intrinsic motivation coming from creating solutions from problems
Driven to stay current in knowledge and well ahead of consumer trends
